title: How does LP work
body: So im bronze 4 atm just got there and still tanking up but im only getting about 10-15 LP instead of the 20-25 LP when im in bronze 5 and when i checked my MMR it says that my MMR is quite above average... im kinda confused someone fill me in

replies.body:
Hey man

Ranked LP is given based on the MMR difference between the two teams. If you had the unfavorable MMR then you'll gain more LP and vice versa.** Riot Support** has an in-depth post on this [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h2q3).

With that out of the way, this is why you might not be gaining the LP you expect:

+ According to [OP.GG](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=oceanicman) your MMR is not above average currently. You might need to hit the refresh button to see this. It's at **986** MMR as of right now.

+ OP.GG does not give official MMR. No one but **Riot** knows your MMR. What you see on OP.GG is simply an estimate, your actual MMR could be quite a bit different.

+ You're duo queuing with friends who have far higher MMR than you. This is bringing up your team's average MMR thus resulting in less LP gains and more LP losses.

There could be more reasons than just this, I've just mentioned the most likely reasons. It's possible that **Riot** has made some small changes to the LP and MMR system without notifying us.

I hope this helps.

Yea it was above than aevrage but I recently lost 2 games in a row so it might have dropped than and but if I do manage to get to bronze 3 and still duo with my friend will I get the same amout of LP 10-15 or will I get more

You should get slightly higher amounts of LP when you're in Bronze 3, because your MMR should be higher. You probably wont notice the extra LP gains though, at least until you get much closer to your friend's rank.
